definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be fair, seemly (Targum Syr.; cf. BH (rare and mostly late); Palm. [[שפר ל]] merit well of, SAC:117; Cappad. Aram. [[שפירא]] Lzb:Eph 160);—

definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׁ]]:, c. [[קֳדָם]] pers. it seemed good to Da 3:32, Da 6:2; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׁפַּר עַל]] Da 4:24 let my counsel be acceptable to thee.
